Keywords: Avengers , Defenders , Illuminati , Mystical
Real Name: Stephen Strange
Special Powers
BRING IN HELP FROM THE MULTIVERSE: Leadership. When Dr. Strange uses it and succeeds, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #011 Astral Dr. Strange on click #1. If a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #013 Wong on click #1 if there isn't a friendly Avengers Forever #013 Wong on the map.
CLOAK OF LEVITATION: Telekinesis. Telekinesis as FREE, but only to target himself.
KEEPER OF THE TIME STONE: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.
